author: Mark Lynch
description: Depending on the sweetness of your molasses, you may not need to add sugar syrup.
name: Black Tie
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
